intro.title: Mikhail Kobtsev
intro.subtitle: React Front-end developer in search of interesting projects and proposals
intro.description: I specialize on creating user interfaces & developing rich web applications. I have experience working with big international company & creating many demo projects in this area.

about.text: Hello, my name is Michael, I’m <0>20 years</0> old <0>Computer science student in NSU</0> who is interested in creating web applications.<1></1><1></1>I have about <0>2 years experience</0> in which I managed to work on <0>2 commercial projects</0> and over 10 demo projects.<1></1><1></1>At first I was practicing as a <0> Python Full-stack developer </0> and now decided to choose a narrower focus.<1></1><1></1><0>Main technologies</0> I’ve been working with are shown on the right.
